.create()

SC.Object.create takes an object literal and will copy the standard SC.Object properties, methods and mixins on the given object. You can also provide mixins, in this case SC.Enumerable. 

   MyApp.MyNewObject = SC.Object.create(SC.Enumerable,{
     property: value,
     anotherProperty: anotherValue,
     aMethod: function(params){
       // function body
       return params;
     }
   });
